remarks: The result of the group power operator when the exponent is negative. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 17-Apr-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
gxnval.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
gxnval.2 $e |- P = ( ^g ` G ) $.
gxnval.3 $e |- N = ( inv ` G ) $.
gxnval $p |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ ( K e. ZZ /\ K < 0 ) ) -> ( A P K ) = ( N ` ( seq 1 ( G , ( NN X. { A } ) ) ` -u K ) ) ) $.
